entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:11 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 10:11 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:11 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
